name: Minos (RockCastle Studio)
description:
Minos is a VR Suspense puzzle game.

Minos has been developed in 9 days for VR Jam 2022 by the Rock Castle Studio team.
We are a young team and this is our first project together.

You are a explorer locked in the depths of the Mythical Dedalu´s Labyrinth.
Find your way out the intricated corridors and puzzles before your glowing stick runs out (10 min) and the Minotaur finds you.

The glowstick and the puzzles can only be used once.

At Minos you will enjoy:

Indiana Jones like puzzles.
Creepy suspense atmosphere.
Getting lost in a labyrinth.

Credits can be found inside the game

Platforms:

You will need your Oculus Quest 2.
You can also play in PC (tested with Oculus Quest 2).

Troubles: The idea was to have just the glowing stick as the main light, but we have had a lot of trouble with real time lighting and it hasnt been possible.

Things that make us proud: we have made all the 3D and 2D assets that you can see in the game within the 9 days of jam. Also the OTS has been composed during the same time.
